headline: Jim Cramer on Campbell’s: “You’re Fine to Be Able to Buy Some”
summary: The Campbell’s Company (NASDAQ:CPB) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his thoughts on. A viewer asked for Cramer’s thoughts on the company, and in response, he stated: “Okay, now I had some thoughts about Campbell’s. When I saw that WK Kellogg got a bid from this outfit… I said, geez, Campbell’s has finally […]
